source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_00<tab>Mogleo has found a moogle in a most compromising position.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_00<tab>Mogleo semble une fois de plus avoir trouvé un Mog à qui venir en aide.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_01<tab>Mogleo, in his journey to help moogles everywhere, has come upon a prone member of the Pomguard. However, it is not certain whether the moogle is injured or merely taking a nap. Talk to the moogle to find out if he is in a predicament that needs solving, or if he would just like to be left in dreamland.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_01<tab>Mogleo a trouvé un Mog de la Garde-pompon apparemment très mal en point. Demandez à ce Mog ce qui lui est arrivé.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_02<tab>It seems an encounter with a nearby tree has left the Pomguard moogle dazed, confused, and unable to move. The only thing that may possibly save him is a kupo nut. Though Mogleo is leery of the seriousness of the moogle's condition, he decides to aid him nonetheless. Speak with Mogleo to receive instructions.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_02<tab>Le Mog de la Garde-pompon s'est cogné la tête contre un arbre par mégarde et semble souffrir d'une grosse contusion. Il prétend être à l'agonie et souhaiterait manger <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> pour retrouver des forces. Parlez à Mogleo pour décider de ce que vous allez faire.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_03<tab>Mogleo laments that he cannot solve this problem on his own, and decides that he will stand watch over the Pomguard moogle while you return to Moghome for a kupo nut. Make your way back to the settlement and ask Moggzia if he has any of the precious nuts to spare.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_03<tab>Mogleo dit qu'il serait risqué de déplacer le Mog de la Garde-pompon du fait de sa blessure à la tête. Il se propose de rester avec lui pour le protéger des monstres des environs, pendant que vous allez réclamer <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> à Moggzia. Rendez-vous au Nid-Mog pour aller chercher le fruit tant désiré.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_04<tab>Moggzia seems to have more kupo nuts than he knows what to do with, and readily hands one over to aid a member of the Pomguard. Hurry and give the nut to the ailing moogle before the last of his limited energy leaves his pom.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_04<tab>Moggzia était navré d'apprendre la mésaventure du Mog de la Garde-pompon et vous a donné <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> sans hésitation. Retournez auprès de Mogleo pour la lui apporter.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_05<tab>Upon eating the kupo nut, the Pomguard moogle's disposition changes drastically, and his earlier ailment seems like a distant memory. Before you can even wonder at his remarkable recovery, he bids you and Mogleo join him back at Moghome for a meeting with his commander, Captain Mogloo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_05<tab>Le Mog de la Garde-pompon a im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment retrouvé des forces en mangeant <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B740202 /var> et vous a exprimé sa gratitude. Il a alors demandé à Mogleo de le suivre pour aller voir le commandant Mogloo et vous a invité<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à vous joindre à eux. Rejoignez-les au Nid-Mog.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_06<tab>Mogleo hesitantly presents himself before Captain Mogloo of the Pomguard, who scolds him for putting himself in danger by going out into the wilderness alone. To ensure that Mogleo has a proper outlet for his altruistic tendencies, Mogloo names him a new member of the Pomguard. It would seem that moogles from all over the Churning Mists have vouched for Mogleo, the Pomguard member he but recently rescued among them. With his courage and selflessness, Mogleo will make a fine addition to the lauded ranks of the Pomguard.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_SEQ_06<tab>Le commandant Mogloo a beaucoup entendu parler de Mogleo. Il lui a interdit d'errer seul à la recherche de Mogs en détresse et l'a invité à rejoindre les rangs de la Garde-pompon en l'honneur du courage dont il a fait preuve. Grâce à votre aide, Mogleo a réalisé son rêve.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Pomguard moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_00<tab>Parler au Mog de la Garde-pompon

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Mogleo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Mogleo

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_02<tab>Obtain a kupo nut from Moggzia.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_02<tab>Obtenir <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> de Moggzia

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the kupo nut to the Pomguard moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_03<tab>Donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B740202 /var> au Mog de la Garde-pompon

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Mogloo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TODO_04<tab>Parler à Mogloo au Nid-Mog

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TROUBLEMOG03_100_000<tab>It's great to be back in Asah, but I miss my flowers, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_TROUBLEMOG03_100_000<tab>Merci encore pour votre aide, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_000<tab>I can't... I can't go on, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_000<tab>J'ai mal, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_000<tab>Adventurer, look! It's a moogle from the Pomguard, and he's been knocked unconscious, or is he...napping? There's only one way to find out─ask him, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_000<tab>Ce pauvre Mog a l'air mal en point. Demandons-lui ce qui lui est arrivé, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_014<tab>Even if he is napping, this is no place to be dozing off! Find out what's wrong with him, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_014<tab>Il faut qu'on l'aide, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_010<tab>This is...the end, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_010<tab>J'ai trop mal, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_011<tab>Speak to me! What happened to you?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_011<tab>Tenez bon<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes venus vous aider<var 1D /var>! Que vous est-il arrivé, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_012<tab>I was...on patrol... I was caught unawares...and I was attacked...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_012<tab>J'étais en train de faire ma ronde... J'ai détourné le regard deux secondes, kuppo, et là... Ouuuh...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_013<tab>You were attacked? By whom, kupo?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_013<tab>Courage<var 1D /var>! Et là quoi<var 1D /var>? Que s'est-il passé, kuppo<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_014<tab>A tree... It was...a tree... Ohhh, my head...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_014<tab>Et là... Bam<var 1D /var>! Je me suis cogné contre un arbre, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_015<tab>...Attacked by a tree!? Adventurer, I'm afraid this is nothing but a clumsy moogle, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_015<tab>Ah, je vois... Je m'attendais à autre chose, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_016<tab>My life...is flashing...before my eyes... If only I had...brought more kupo nuts...I could pull through...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_016<tab>Je crois que je n'en ai plus pour longtemps, kuppo... Peut-être que je retrouverais des forces, si je pouvais manger <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var>...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_017<tab><sigh> It's just a slight bump on the head, he'll be flitting about in time. Nevertheless, a moogle is in need, and I shall help however I can! Adventurer, let us discuss our new strategy!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_017<tab>J'ai l'impression qu'il exagère un petit peu, mais je ne peux pas abandonner un Mog en détresse... Bon, voyons ce qu'on peut faire, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_021<tab>Mother...Father...you're all here, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_021<tab>Je crois que je n'en ai plus pour longtemps... J'aimerais manger <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> avant de partir pour l'autre monde, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_020<tab>Well, everyone knows moving about when you've hit your head is dangerous. What's more, this area is crawling with carnivorous monsters, so we can't just leave him here...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_020<tab>Ce serait risqué de le déplacer s'il s'est blessé à la tête, mais on ne peut pas non plus le laisser là avec tous les monstres qui rôdent dans les parages, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_021<tab>What's that? You'll go and get the kupo nut while I stand guard? Alas, once again I lack the strength to refuse your aid. Adventurer, hurry and bring the kupo nut before one of these mean-looking monsters decides to get curious.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'ai bien peur d'avoir encore besoin de votre aide... J'aimerais que vous alliez chercher <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> pendant que je reste ici pour le protéger, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_022<tab>Getting a kupo nut should be as simple as asking Moggzia, who looks after Moghome's supply. If you explain the situation, he should be willing to part with a nut or two, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_022<tab>C'est Moggzia, du Nid-Mog, qui gère les stocks de <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8B740302 /var>. Je suis sûr qu'il vous en donnera une si vous lui expliquez la situation, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_032<tab>Moggzia is in charge of Moghome's supply of kupo nuts. Explain to him our situation, and he should be willing to part with a nut or two, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_032<tab>Allez expliquer ce qui se passe à Moggzia, au Nid-Mog. Il vous donnera <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var>. Moi, je reste ici pour protéger ce Mog, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGZIA_000_030<tab>...What's that!? A Pomguard in need of a kupo nut!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGZIA_000_030<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>!? Un Mog à l'agonie a besoin d'<var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var> pour retrouver des forces, kuppo<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGZIA_000_031<tab>It's a terrible thing, for a Pomguard moogle to be trapped out in the wild without their precious nuts. Very well, take as many as you need. Best bring it to him quick!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGZIA_000_031<tab>Le pauvre<var 1D /var>! Tenez, prenez celle-ci<var 1D /var>! Dépêchez-vous de la lui apporter, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGZIA_000_048<tab>Well, hurry up! A Pomguard without his nuts is no guard at all, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGZIA_000_048<tab>Dépêchez-vous d'apporter <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B740202 /var> à ce pauvre Mog, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_040<tab>Oh, were you looking for us, kupo? An archaeosaur was getting a little too close for comfort, so Mogleo and I fled over here.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_040<tab>Vous nous avez cherchés<var 1D /var>? Désolé, nous avons dû fuir de toute urgence pour venir nous réfugier ici, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_041<tab>I mean... Ohhh...my poor head... Did you...did you bring me a kupo nut?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_041<tab>Est-ce que vous m'avez rapporté <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B740202 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_042<tab>Oh, thank heavens, kupo! It's so delicious, and it's been so long... Yes, I can feel it. I can feel...the power, kupopo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_042Merci, kuppo...
...
Hmm! C'est si bon! Je sens que je retrouve des forces, kuppo!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_043<tab>Ah, it's good to feel alive again! I must remember to bring more kupo nuts with me on my next patrol. You've saved my pom, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_043<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>! On se sent tout de suite mieux après une bonne <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8B740202 /var><var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez sauvé la vie, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_044<tab>My thanks, Mogleo. Without your aid, I would have met an untimely demise, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_044<tab>Et je ne remercierai jamais assez Mogleo qui m'a protégé tout en me réconfortant, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_045<tab>You...you are too kind. All I did was flee from that archaeosaur...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_045<tab>N'exagérons rien. Je n'ai fait quasiment que m'enfuir, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_046<tab>Nonsense, kupo! You could have left me to be prey to the wild beasts, but you risked your pom-pom to carry me with you. You can hold your head high!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_046<tab>Mais vous ne m'avez pas abandonné<var 1D /var>! Vous avez fait preuve d'un grand courage. Vous pouvez être fier de vous, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_047<tab>...But this isn't an ideal place for long-winded praise. Let us return to Moghome and seek out Captain Mogloo, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_047<tab>Oh, mais nous ne devrions pas traîner ici plus longtemps<var 1D /var>! Allons voir le commandant Mogloo, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_048<tab>Captain Mogloo? Why, whatever for, kupo?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_048<tab>Le commandant Mogloo<var 1D /var>? De la Garde-pompon<var 1D /var>? Mais... pour quoi faire, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_049<tab>All shall be revealed in good time. Ah, yes, your companion may come along as well.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_049Vous verrez bien! Allez, suivez-moi! Direction le Nid-Mog, kuppo!
Vous aussi, brave !

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_080<tab>Captain Mogloo wishes to speak with <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_080<tab>Je me demande ce que me veut le commandant Mogloo. Il est vraiment intimidant, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_070<tab>Mogleo, listen well, kupo. You will want to hear what Captain Mogloo has to say.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_070<tab>Mogleo a l'air un peu stressé. Je sens qu'il va être surpris, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_060<tab>So, you are the daring Mogleo of whom I have heard so much. I am given to understand you have been helping our troubled brethren across the land.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_060<tab>Mogleo, te voilà enfin. J'ai beaucoup entendu parler de toi. Il paraît que tu erres seul à la recherche de Mogs en détresse, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_061<tab>I merely do what any upstanding moogle would, kupo. Though my trusty companion here deserves much and more of the credit.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_061<tab>Oui, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Mais je ne suis pas tout à fait seul. <var 08 E905 ((Cette aventurière)) ((Cet aventurier)) /var> m'a beaucoup aidé, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_062<tab>Hmmm... Although you have this adventurer's hand to aid you, you must stop this one-moogle crusade. Should the worst happen, it would be a grievous loss, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_062<tab>Que tu aies reçu de l'aide ou non importe peu. Agir seul et de façon aussi précipitée est très imprudent. Je ne peux pas te laisser continuer, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_063<tab>Are you saying...I can't even help just <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> more moogle? But I...I just wanted to prove myself worthy of the Pomguard.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_063<tab>Mais... Je veux juste rendre service, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Enfin, à vrai dire, j'aimerais faire mes preuves... Vous êtes sûr que je ne peux pas continuer, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_064<tab>Do not make me repeat myself, Mogleo. Though your intent is noble, you cannot continue helping other moogles alone...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_064<tab>C'est hors de question. Errer seul comme tu l'as fait est beaucoup trop dangereux, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_065<tab>Nay, henceforth, you will do so as a member of the Pomguard, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_065<tab>C'est pourquoi... tu seras désormais accompagné d'autres Mogs, en tant que membre de la Garde-pompon, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_066<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Me<var 1A 01 /var>...in the Pomguard!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_066<tab>Qu-qu-quoi<var 1D /var>!? Ai-je bien entendu ce que vous venez de dire, kuppo<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_067<tab>We could ask for no greater honor than to count you amongst our ranks! Moogles all over, a brother of the Pomguard among them, vouch for your skill and valor both. I can think of no worthier addition to our ranks.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_067<tab>Tu es digne de faire partie des nôtres, Mogleo<var 1D /var>! Tu t'es mis en quatre pour aider de nombreux Mogs, y compris un de nos membres, et ils t'en sont tous re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sants, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_068<tab>Hear, hear, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_068<tab>Kuppopo<var 1D /var>! Tu as largement fait tes preuves, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_069<tab>A-Are you sure I'm strong enough!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_069<tab>Ce n'est pas une blague<var 1D /var>!? Je peux vraiment entrer dans la Garde-pompon, kuppo<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_070<tab>Strength is important, 'tis true, but it is naught without courage. And courage is something you do not want for, kupo. I have great expectations of you, Mogleo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLOO_000_070<tab>Tu as quelque chose de plus important que la force<var 1D /var>: le courage<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes fiers de t'accueillir dans nos rangs, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_071<tab>Th-This is everything I've ever dreamed of! It's even better than the time I ate four kupo nuts at once! Finally, I'm Mogleo of the Pomguard, kupopo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGLEO_000_071<tab>Kuppopo<var 1D /var>! Je n'arrive pas à y croire<var 1D /var>! Je suis entré dans la Garde-pompon<var 1D /var>! J'ai l'impression de rêver, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_072<tab>Welcome to the brotherhood, kupo! Come with me, and I shall introduce you to everyone!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ414_01832_MOGGUARD01_000_072<tab>Nous sommes des compagnons d'armes, maintenant, Mogleo<var 1D /var>! Allez viens, je vais te présenter aux autres, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
